title: Posedla start-up developing 3D-printed carbon saddles, actually custom fit to each rider
content:
A new Czech startup named Posedla is working on taking customized bike fit to the next level with their new custom 3D-printed carbon saddle concept. While there are now a few large and small companies offering premium, lightweight carbon saddles topped with 3D-printed TPU padding that promises a better balance of comfort and supportâ€¦ none

The post Posedla start-up developing 3D-printed carbon saddles, actually custom fit to each rider appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
